quote: My goal as a teacher is  to inspire a passion for practice. The practice itself, done  consistently and accurately, is the real teacher.
author: Tim Miller, Aśṭāṅga Yoga teacher

quote: The greatest Yogi is the one who enjoys his or her Yoga practice the most, not the one who can achieve the ultimate pretzel position.
author: David Williams, Aśṭāṅga Yoga teacher

quote: In your practice of this moving meditation, what is important is what is invisible to the observer, what is within each of you.
author: David Williams, Aśṭāṅga Yoga teacher

quote: Every system of knowledge is also a system of ignorance. Many people either don't want to think or don't realize that there is ignorance in their system, so they give themselves over 100% to it, they go overboard in trying to do it the way they think its supposed to be done.
author: David Garrigue, Aśṭāṅga Yoga teacher
